decks.notes: The main idea of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a wide range of spells and creatures to disrupt the opponent's strategy while generating card advantage through Niv-Mizzet Reborn's ability to draw multiple cards. The deck includes a variety of removal spells like Fatal Push, Lightning Bolt, and Abrupt Decay to deal with threats on the board, as well as counterspells such as Mana Leak and Force of Will to stop key spells from resolving. Additionally, the deck includes versatile cards like Klothys, God of Destiny and Demonic Tutor to provide additional value and flexibility in different situations. Overall, the goal is to outvalue the opponent and maintain control of the game until victory is achieved.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Tivit, Seller of Secrets serves as the commander, providing card advantage and potentially disrupting the opponent's hand. The deck includes a variety of counterspells like Counterspell, Force of Will, and Force of Negation to stop key spells from resolving. Removal spells such as Fatal Push, Swords to Plowshares, and Toxic Deluge deal with threats on the board. Card advantage is gained through cards like Brainstorm, Mystic Confluence, and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria. The goal is to outvalue the opponent and control the game until victory is achieved.

Utilizing Galazeth Prismari as the commander, this control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's game plan while steadily building resources and advantage through mana rocks and powerful spells. The deck includes a mix of countermagic, removal, and versatile threats to handle a variety of threats and strategies. It aims to control the pace of the game, utilizing Galazeth Prismari's ability to generate mana from artifacts to cast impactful spells and quickly shift the momentum in its favor. The deck also includes utility lands and artifacts to provide additional flexibility and resilience. Overall, the strategy revolves around resource management, disruption, and efficient threat deployment to outmaneuver opponents and secure victory.

The deck is focused on utilizing powerful graveyard interactions and creature combos to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Buried Alive, Reanimate, Dread Return, and Living Death, the deck can quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures and bring them back into play for a huge advantage. Combining this with cards like Demonic Tutor, Worldly Tutor, and Survival of the Fittest allows the deck to search for key combo pieces and set up game-winning plays. The commander, Old Rutstein, acts as a powerful enabler for the graveyard strategy, providing additional value and resources to fuel the deck's game plan. The deck's goal is to assemble its combo pieces quickly and efficiently to dominate the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing the partner commanders Thrasios, Triton Hero and Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful to create a fast and aggressive strategy. The deck contains a mix of mana ramp creatures like Birds of Paradise and Elves, along with powerful cards like Command Tower and Collected Company to quickly build up a strong board presence. The inclusion of cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Steelshaper's Gift allows for equipment tutoring to enhance the aggression of creatures. With a variety of protection spells like Giver of Runes and Sylvan Safekeeper, along with disruptive creatures like Esper Sentinel and Elite Spellbinder, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents early on and secure a swift victory.
